name: pr-copilot-mcp
description: MCP server for GitHub PR creation and analysis with AI-generated summaries using AI LLM and JIRA ticket integration - create pull requests with enhanced descriptions, generate PR summaries, analyze code changes, and JIRA ticket context with Figma links. Optimized configuration with environment variables for flexible deployment.

environment_variables.name: GITHUB_TOKEN
environment_variables.description: GitHub token with repository permissions for PR creation and repository access

environment_variables.name: JIRA_API_TOKEN
environment_variables.description: JIRA API token for Bearer authentication (optional - enables detailed ticket info in PR descriptions)
